Get the contact email for OpenAlex requests

Source: R/utils.R
oap_mail.Rd

Retrieves the contact email address used in the User-Agent header for OpenAlex requests. The value is taken from the environment variable openalexR.mailto if set; otherwise it falls back to the R option openalexR.mailto. If neither is defined, NULL is returned.

Usage

oap_mail()

Value

A character scalar with the email address, or NULL if not configured.

Details

This helper mirrors the behavior of openalexR::oa_email() to make it easy to configure a contact address without a hard dependency. Supplying a valid email helps with responsible API usage.

See also

openalexR::oa_email

Examples

Sys.setenv(openalexR.mailto = "name@example.org")
oap_mail()
#> [1] "name@example.org"

options(openalexR.mailto = "name@example.org")
oap_mail()
#> [1] "name@example.org"
